CustomField.description: Updates Team based on Verticals section to use in Brian's Report.
CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Verticals__c), 'Contractor Development','CDev', 'Aerospace & Defense','Aerospace', 'Australia & New Zealand','ANZ', 'Beverages & Dairy','Bev', 'Chemicals North','Chem North', 'Chemicals South','Chem South', 'Latin America','Lat Am', 'Midstream','MS', 'Mining','Onshore West', 'Pharma & Facilities Management','Pharma', 'Pipelines Cross Borders','Pipelines C/B', 'Steel & Metals','Steel', 'Utilities, Power Gen & Public Sector East','Utilities East', 'Utilities, Power Gen & Public Sector West','Utilities West', 'Western Canada C/Os, Utilities & Public Sector','West Can COUPS', 'Western Canada Mining / Oil & Gas','West Can MOG', TEXT(Verticals__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field updates automatically based on Verticals selection.
CustomField.label: Team (Account)
